text: Rolf Zehetbauer (13 February 1929 â€“ 23 January 2022) was a German production designer, art director and set decorator. He was born in Munich, Germany. Zehetbauer won an Academy Award for Best Art Direction for the movie Cabaret in 1973. He also worked on Das Boot and The NeverEnding Story. Zehetbauer died on 23 January 2022, at the age of 92. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2022 deaths Category:German artists Category:Academy Award winners Category:People from Munich Category:Set designers
title: Rolf Zehetbauer
